alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Lincoln; Logan; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:06AM CDT until July 29 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Loup County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Logan County in west central Nebraska... Custer County in central Nebraska... Southeastern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 406 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Victoria Springs State Recreation Area to 11 miles south of Gandy, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Arnold, Callaway, Sargent, Ansley, Merna, Mason City, Oconto, Anselmo, Comstock, Berwyn, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Weissert, Westerville, Lillian, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Walworth, Lodi and Buckeye. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 73 and 116. Highway 2 between mile markers 253 and 307. Highway 92 between mile markers 241 and 308. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
